# JsonPointer.Evaluate method

Evaluates the pointer against the specified JSON token.

```csharp
public JToken Evaluate(JToken jToken)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| jToken | The JSON token. |

## Return Value

The JSON token being pointed to, or null if the token does not exist.
